text: Vastavika, suruvaticya kalata sarva loka ekaca janasamuhace (dina-dharmace) hote. Maga allahane paigambaranna subha samacara denyasathi ani saceta karanyasathi pathavile ani tyancyasobata grantha avatarita kele, yasathi ki lokancya daramyana asalelya pratyeka matabhedaca phaisala vhava, ani kevala tyaca lokanni, je tyanna dile gele hote, apalyajavala pramana ye'una pohacalyanantarahi apalya dvesa ani ghamendimule tyata matabheda kela. Yakarita allahane imanadharakancya ya matabhedatahi satyakade apalya ajnene margadarsana kele ani allaha jyala icchito sarala margakade margadarsana karato
